main event: Multiple unidentified objects were observed on radar and visually between Savannah, Georgia and Albany, Georgia on December 6, 1957.
interesting points: The objects appeared as brilliant lights, approximately the brightness of aircraft landing lights, accompanied by smaller flashing lights.
The objects descended to the horizon, with some appearing the size of a car and others the size of a basketball.
The objects ascended rapidly at times and slowly at other times, as if landing.
A total of 3 lights were extinguished, as if the lights were turned off.
The sightings lasted for approximately 3 hours.
sighted object: Unidentified flying objects appearing as brilliant lights and objects of varying sizes
witnesses: Military personnel, including a radar operator
